abilities.name: Blast Shot
abilities.description: Fire an explosive projectile that knocks enemies back.

abilities.name: Disengage
abilities.description: The next shot you fire after activating Disengage blasts the target backward.

abilities.name: Scout
abilities.description: Cassie reveals all enemies on the map to her and her team for 8s. While Scout is active, Cassie deals +15% damage.

abilities.name: Dodge Roll
abilities.description: Quickly roll in the direction you are moving. Removes all debuffs on use.
